title: Will i get banned for using LSI?
body:
http://www.leaguelsi.com/

It says i wont on the sight, but i would like to hear from someone who knows

replies.body: Totally fine to use it. We worked with LSI directly to ensure that their features fit within our 3rd party guidelines.

Well, there you have it. Looking at it's features, it seems like nothing to be worried about, anyway. It doesn't do anything that multitudes of websites don't do already. They just have it easier to access in a program.
I'm glad you guys are reasonable about this, +1 for having sane ToS.

I think I might actually use this. Which is saying quite something, since I never use or have interest in 3rd party programs.

Will this make my game harder to patch? Or provide any other technical difficulty?
